{"id":1784900760,"question_id":3962,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 month, 3 weeks","timestamp":1759031846,"status":15,"status_display":"Runtime Error","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1784900760/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Number of ZigZag Arrays I","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int zigZagArrays(int n, int l, int r) {\n        const int MOD = 1e9+7;\n        int d = r - l + 1;\n\n        vector<vector<vector<int>>> dp(n, vector<vector<int>>(d, vector<int>(2, 0)));\n        for (int j=0; j<d; j++) {\n            dp[1][j][0] = d-j-1;\n            dp[1][j][1] = j;\n        }\n\n        for (int i=1; i<n-1; i++) {\n            for (int j=0; j<d; j++) {\n                bool b = true;\n                for (int k=0; k<=j-1; k++) {\n                    if (k < d)\n                        dp[i+1][k][!b] += dp[i][j][b];\n                }\n                \n                b = false;\n                for (int k=j+1; k<d; k++) {\n                    if (k >= 0)\n                        dp[i+1][k][!b] += dp[i][j][b];\n                }\n            }\n        }\n\n        for (int i=0; i<n; i++) {\n            cout << setw(4);\n            for (int j=0; j<d; j++) {\n                cout << dp[i][j][0] << \",\" << dp[i][j][1] << \" \";\n            }\n            cout << endl;\n        }\n\n        int sum = 0;\n        for (int j=0; j<d; j++) \n            sum += dp[n-1][j][0] + dp[n-1][j][1];\n        return sum;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"number-of-zigzag-arrays-i","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1223}
